mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_resources ( resource_id, course_id, uploader_id, resource_name, original_file_name, stored_file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type, resource_type, description, download_count, visible ) VALUES ( #{resourceId}, #{courseId}, #{uploaderId}, #{resourceName}, #{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{resourceType}, #{description}, #{downloadCount}, #{visible} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM course_resources WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND visible = TRUE ORDER BY upload_time DESC
